BEGIN TRY
    BEGIN TRANSACTION $trans_name$
    	
	COMMIT TRANSACTION $trans_name$
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
	IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0
		BEGIN
		    ROLLBACK TRANSACTION $trans_name$
		END
    DECLARE @ErrMsg NVARCHAR(2000) = N'Lá»—i: [] - ERR: ' + ERROR_MESSAGE() + ' - Line: ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR, ERROR_LINE())
	INSERT INTO	dbo.Log
	        (
	         CreateDateTime
	       , CreateBy
	       , UpdateBy
	       , Content
	        )
	VALUES
	        (
	         GETDATE()  -- CreateDateTime - datetime
	       , N''  -- CreateBy - nchar(40)
	       , N'QuangLP'  -- UpdateBy - nchar(40)
	       , @ErrMsg  -- Content - nvarchar(2000)
	        )
END CATCH
